title: DeskSMS - Desktop Text Messaging Messenger
description:
Send Android SMS text messages from your computer with the DeskSMS app.
DeskSMS integrates Android Texts with your computer.
Thanks to
PC World
,
Lifehacker
, and
GadgetHacks
for featuring us!
Download the app, and signin using your Google account. You can then use DeskSMS desktop app to send & receive text messages via your Android phone.
★ Sync your Android contacts to your desktop computer.
★ Take advantage of the native Windows & macOS notifications.
★ No need to rely on browser extensions. Use DeskSMS app on your computer to send & receive text messages through your Android phone #.
★ Best alternative to other SMS syncing apps since DeskSMS provides a native app for both Windows & macOS.
★ DeskSMS is a premium product, designed specifically for Android users.
How does it work?
DeskSMS securely routes your text messages between your computer and your Android phone. Once you download the app, you will signin using your Google account. You can then download the desktop app start syncing your text messages.
Privacy
DeskSMS securely stores all your text messages. Your messages are stored encrypted and is not shared in any way with other 3rd parties.
Pricing
DeskSMS will allow you to send & receive up to 5 messages per day, for free. You will need to upgrade to PRO version in order to unlock unlimited text messaging.
Having troubles with the app? Please check out our
FAQ page
for help.
All product and company names used are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them. DeskSMS is developed by MDRS, LLC and is not in any way affiliated with Google, Inc.

Send Android SMS text messages from your computer with the DeskSMS app.

DeskSMS integrates Android Texts with your computer.

Thanks to PC World, Lifehacker, and GadgetHacks for featuring us!

Download the app, and signin using your Google account. You can then use DeskSMS desktop app to send & receive text messages via your Android phone.

★ Sync your Android contacts to your desktop computer.
★ Take advantage of the native Windows & macOS notifications.
★ No need to rely on browser extensions. Use DeskSMS app on your computer to send & receive text messages through your Android phone #.
★ Best alternative to other SMS syncing apps since DeskSMS provides a native app for both Windows & macOS.
★ DeskSMS is a premium product, designed specifically for Android users.


How does it work?
DeskSMS securely routes your text messages between your computer and your Android phone. Once you download the app, you will signin using your Google account. You can then download the desktop app start syncing your text messages.

Privacy
DeskSMS securely stores all your text messages. Your messages are stored encrypted and is not shared in any way with other 3rd parties.

Pricing
DeskSMS will allow you to send & receive up to 5 messages per day, for free. You will need to upgrade to PRO version in order to unlock unlimited text messaging.

Having troubles with the app? Please check out our FAQ page for help.
